summary: Test suite that validates the Stable Diffusion XL image‑to‑image pipeline enhanced with Prompt‑Attention Guidance, providing fast unit tests for dummy component setup, PAG toggling, inference behavior, and optional component serialization, as well as integration tests for both conditional and unconditional configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of the PAG‑enabled image‑to‑image generation pipeline, preventing regressions and ensuring reliable performance for downstream AI image creation services.
